name: Vengeful
description:
They killed your family and left your home a smouldering ruins. Now they must pay even if it costs you the little you have left!

Vengeful is a roguelike game that is not easy, but the more you die, the angrier you will get and every so often, you blood will boil over and you will get more powerful but at what cost? What will you have left after revenge has been taken?

Note: This is an early prototype in need of more development, but I thought I'd toss it out and see if I could get any feedback.
